titles.title: To prohibit the expenditure of Federal funds to provide or support programs to provide individuals with hypodermic needles or syringes for the use of illegal drugs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 4/22/1998--Introduced. Prohibits Federal funds from being made available to carry out any program of distributing sterile hypodermic needles or syringes for the hypodermic injection of any illegal drug.
